revised_title: Statistical Adsorption Isotherm and Condensation-Evaporation of Atoms and Molecules
tldr: This article presents a theoretical study of the interaction between atoms and molecules and solid surfaces, focusing on the condensation and evaporation processes. The authors develop a statistical adsorption isotherm model to describe the equilibrium between adsorbed and evaporated states, providing a foundation for understanding and predicting the behavior of atoms and molecules on surfaces.
